text: NESFRUTA Orange Peach MangoFeatures and Benefits

Orange juice concentrate, water, citric acid (for tartness), flavour, potassium citrate, colour, sucralose, acesulfame potassium, potassium sorbate.Contains 28 mg sucralose and 5 mg acesulfame potassium per 2 ml serving.
